products.nd_ngan: Thiết kế trẻ trung, hiện đại, đơn giản
products.nd_chitiet: The pink polo shirt is made from cotton piqué and features a 'CD Icon' embroidery at the chest. Cut in a regular fit, it pairs well with jeans, joggers and cargos.

products.nd_ngan: Thiết kế trẻ trung, hiện đại, đơn giản
products.nd_chitiet: This graphic T-shirt gives the season’s LV Leaf motif a distinctive twist, using the traditional corrosion printing technique. Applied to a dark cotton base, it reproduces the design in a natural cotton color on both the inside and the outside of the piece. The result is a unique, high-definition version of the delicate floral design.

products.nd_ngan: Thiết kế trẻ trung, hiện đại, đơn giản
products.nd_chitiet: Cut with a mock neck, the black heavy cotton T-shirt features a DIOR AND SHAWN bee embroidered on the chest and bead embroidery on the collar. Blending Dior heritage with Californian surfer style, it can be worn with jeans, cargo pants or shorts.

products.nd_ngan: Thiết kế trẻ trung, hiện đại, đơn giản
products.nd_chitiet: Woven onto a knit wool sweater, the rose is a central theme that blooms throughout the collection embodying a uniform of bold color and statement pattern play

products.nd_ngan: Thiết kế trẻ trung, hiện đại, đơn giản
products.nd_chitiet: The white T-shirt pays tribute to the House's couturiers with the 'Christian Dior Atelier' signature. Crafted in cotton, it portrays a loose and oversized fit for a relaxed style. The T-shirt pairs well with jeans or sportswear pieces.

products.nd_ngan: Thiết kế trẻ trung, hiện đại, đơn giản
products.nd_chitiet: The pink T-shirt features a ribbed V-stitched neckline and the white DIOR AND SHAWN signature print on the chest. Garment-dyed with traces of white in an irregular pattern, each individual piece is unique. The T-shirt is made from thick-woven cotton and pairs well with both jeans and shorts.

products.nd_ngan: Thiết kế trẻ trung, hiện đại, đơn giản
products.nd_chitiet: The thick navy blue cotton T-shirt presents a new take on the emblematic Dior Oblique motif, created with a beaded effect. Cut with an oversized silhouette, the contrasting round ribbed collar presents a V-neck topstitching detail for a relaxed effect. Pair this refined style—featuring the season's flagship print—with jeans or track pants for an elevated look.
